title: Betplay Group
author: Betplay Group
content: Winning is easy! Highest spin, you win!Betplay.io invites you to come and join Pragmatic Play Casino’s Drops and Wins network tournament. A prize fund worth EUR/USD 248,000 will be granted to the winners of this network event. This series consists of four weekly tournaments so you will be having a thrilling experience with good wins!The fun-filled tourney will take place from the 8th of February 2023 to the 8th of March 2023.Tournament Schedule:Week 1:  February 8, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to February 15, 2023, 6:59 pm CETWeek 2:  February 15, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to February 22, 2023, 6:59 pm CETWeek 3:  February 22, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to March 1, 2023, 6:59 pm CETWeek 4:  March 1, 2023, 7:01 pm CET to March 8, 2023, 6:59 pm CETThe minimum bet for the two weekly tournaments is 0.50 EUR/USD. The exciting tourney is also accessible in the currencies such as TRY, TND, BRL, and THB.To join, you can play any of Pragmatic Play’s participating games like 5 Lions Megaways, Big Bass Bonanza, Big Bass Splash, Buffalo King, Juicy Fruits, Sugar Rush, Starlight Princess, and many more!If you have any questions concerning the campaign, feel free to contact us via our live chat service by clicking this link: https://betplay.io/en/news/pragmatic-play's-drops-and-wins-tournament
